item.title: Marc Andreessen on Twitter
item.description:
Marc Andreessen on Twitter

‚ÄúAffinity Fraud: A type of investment fraud in which a con artist targets members of an identifiable group based on things such as race, age, religion, etc. The fraudster either is or pretends to be, a member of the group. Often the fraudster promotes a Ponzi or pyramid scheme.‚Äù
